content.p: Programa Nacional de Becas y Crédito Educativo Pronabec (Programa Nacional de Becas y Crédito Educativo) is Peru's national scholarship programme, funding high-achieving Peruvian students to study postgraduate masters and PhD degree courses. The University of Nottingham is proud to be one of Pronabec's partner universities in the UK. See the Pronabec website for full guidance on funding and eligibility criteria. See our Peru webpage for guidance on Nottingham's entry requirements for students from Peru. See the Pronabec website for full details of the scholarship application process and deadlines. Offered by El Programa Nacional de Becas y Crédito Educativo (Pronabec)
